items.title: The Trump Administration’s Very Online Celebrities Are Its Biggest Headaches
items.description: Appointees who represent the biggest departures from convention are the squeakiest wheels, and not in a good way.

items.title: The Bolton Investigation Reportedly Involves More Than the Old Controversy over His Memoir
items.description: Even if the claims are true, it doesn’t make it less petty to pursue a criminal investigation against him.

items.title: Teachers’ Unions Are Still Singing the Same Song
items.description: Politics and pop music keep recycling old hits.

items.title: Long Story Short Shortchanges the American Jewish Experience
items.description: The Netflix show is being praised for its authenticity. But it portrays Judaism as a ‘tradition’ for immigrants to overcome.

items.title: The Green Economy Is Rife with Fraud
items.description: A multimillionaire Democratic donor’s guilty plea raises broader questions about corruption in environmentalist schemes like carbon-offset trading.
